sqlMap.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.AUCTION_BOARD_NUM, m.EMAIL, m.NAME, a.START_AMOUNT, a.HIGHEST_PRICE, a.REGIST_DATE, a.END_DATE, a.MAIN_IMAGE_PATH, a.TITLE from AUCTION a, MEMBER m where a.SELLER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID AND a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#search#||'%' AND a.CATEGORI LIKE '%'||#categori#||'%' AND a.BID_CHECK=#check# AND a.OLD_CHECK=#oldcheck#) where rnum BETWEEN #startCount# and #endCount#

select * from (select rownum rnum,groupbuy_board_num,TITLE, MAIN_IMAGE_PATH, PARTICIPANT_NUM, CATEGORI,END_DATE,REGIST_DATE,DISCOUNT_PRICE from GROUPBUY where TITLE LIKE '%'||#search#||'%' and BUY_CHECK=#check#) where rnum BETWEEN #startCount# and #endCount#
select NAME from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID = #string#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO "DOBID"."GROUPBUY_PARTICIPANT" (GROUPBUY_BOARD_NUM, BUY_PRICE_AMOUNT, BUYER_ID, BUY_DATE, BUY_CHECK) VALUES (#groupbuy_board_num#, #buy_price_amount#, #buyer_id#, TO_DATE(#buy_date#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),#buy_check#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE "DOBID"."GROUPBUY" SET PARTICIPANT_NUM = PARTICIPANT_NUM+1 where GROUPBUY_BOARD_NUM = #int#
UPDATE "DOBID"."AUCTION" SET HIGHEST_PRICE = #price#, HIGHEST_PRICE_ID = #user_id# WHERE AUCTION_BOARD_NUM = #number#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO "DOBID"."AUCTION_PARTICIPANT" (AUCTION_BOARD_NUM, BID_PRICE_AMOUNT, BUYER_ID, BID_DATE, BID_CHECK) VALUES (#auction_board_num#, #bid_price_amount#, #buyer_id#, TO_DATE(#bid_date#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),#bid_check#)
